Reviews.Title: “Our annual mini vacation”
Reviews.Author: Leslie L
Reviews.Content: My husband & I love to visit Ocean City the weekend after Labor Day. The rates can't be beat. The location is perfect, the staff helpful, the rooms clean and the best crabcakes in the city are within walking distance. What more could anyone ask for?

Reviews.Title: “I would stay again”
Reviews.Author: Deena W
Reviews.Content: I booked a two night stay with my sister and niece at the Thunderbird through Priceline.com and would do it again in a heartbeat. The front desk staff was very friendly. Room was clean. The only disturance was the room about us was loud screaming and yelling, which I called the front desk and they took care of it right away. Over all I would stay at the Thunderbird again. Very enjoyable stay

Reviews.Title: “Memorial day weekend - clean and quiet”
Reviews.Author: kbs29
Reviews.Content: My friend and I were in Ocean City for a day, and decided to stay in town that night. After calling a few places, we called the Thunderbird and they had a room available for just the night. The front desk staff was very helpful and friendly. After check-in, we made it up to our room to find a very clean, surprisingly quiet room. It was Memorial day weekend, I was not expecting it to be so quiet. The room had everything we needed for our day (turned overnight) trip. I would recommend the Thunderbird to my friends and family after having a positive experience.

Reviews.AuthorLocation: Washington, District of Columbia, United States
Reviews.Title: “Great Location Great Price - Perfect for last minute booking”
Reviews.Author: Marc1130
Reviews.Content: My friends and I decided to go to ocean city for Labor day. I left on Sunday, booked this motel from ochotels Sunday night. I never had to drive my car once during my vaction. It's less than 10 blocks from the boardwalk, 20 blocks from Seacrets and the motel itself is nice, has a fridge, microwave, safe and free parking + swimming pool. The manager Austin even gave me a Triple A discount. There is no ocean view which is okay because most of the time you are not in the room anyway. I would stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Found our permanent vacation place!!”
Reviews.Author: Amanda H
Reviews.Content: My family and I vacation in Ocean city every year and were never satisfied with our past stays in other motels until now. A friend recommended the Thunderbird Beach motel to me and was the best recommendation ever! First we were greeted by a friendly staff that were pleasant enough to recommend new restaurants and things to do in the area, which was very helpful. Many motels when entering the room disappointed me but here the room was very clean and cozy. The location was also convenient steps away from the ocean; therefore we didn’t have to cross any streets to get to it. Parking was also not an issue, and the pool was great! I would definitely recommend this property to any family or person visiting the resort.

Reviews.Title: “Vacation August 2012”
Reviews.Author: Kingsjam
Reviews.Content: Our stay at the Thunderbird Motel was wonderful!! We loved everything from the room, to the pool, to the housekeeping staff "Ms. Betty", to the proximity to the beach, boardwalk, and other activities. It seemed like it was in the center of the island. We will definitely stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent”
Reviews.Author: gina w
Reviews.Content: We visit the Thunderbird Hotel often, and will continue to do so! Everyone is so friendly and courteous. We are treated GREAT by the staff. Never any problems. Location is great. Parking is great. Hotel is well maintained. Check in and check out is simple. Changing room with shower if you arrive early or stay late. I am already planning another trip to see the great people at The Thunderbird Hotel. Owner/Manager is a awesome person and takes great care of his customers!

Reviews.Title: “Great spur of the moment get away”
Reviews.Author: J F
Reviews.Content: Thunderbird is a great place to get away for a day or more. The staff is very friendly. Brenda from housekeeping came right up to me and introduced herself and was very friendly stating all I had to do was ask and she would assist me. Matt was also a staff member working there and he was very helpful with directions and assistance with my bicycle that had a flat tire. He directed me to a shop that would help me. Both Brenda and Matt went out of their way to make my stay memorable. I would definetly stay at the Thunderbird again.

Reviews.Title: “meh. nothing special”
Reviews.Author: Kim R
Reviews.Content: the location as far as the beach was awesome. practically beach front. the boardwalk is a long way. it starts 5 blocks away but the first mile or so is al hotels all the shops are really far down. the parking lot is a mad house one of the cleaning ladies flipped me off as i was trying to squeeze into the parking lot. there is not enough spots with the amount of rooms. the pool is small really cold but it is clean. and the coffee is very awkward being located right in the little lobby. the actual room was decent. wall paper was peeling in 301. the bathroom was tiny old and brown and the carpet seemed dirty. also none of the outlets stayed plugged in the wall so i had to charge phones in the sink! being situated right next to the hilton it was extremely disappointing but the price was good for what it was.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Stay”
Reviews.Author: melanie b
Reviews.Content: We found the Thunderbird online and was happy with the price. I did minimal research on OC and didn't know that the happening stuff on the boardwalk was a far walk from 31st, where we were. Oh well, with that being said, I was happy with our stay here. The bedding was colorful, inviting and clean. The bathrooms could use a makeover though. The pool was the perfect size and was never cold. Literally steps to the beach. Our a/c didn't work but we called the front desk and someone arrived lickety split to fix it and we didn't have a problem after that. The staff was very friendly too. Keurig coffee machine with Green Mountain coffee available in the office. All in all, a nice, safe, clean place to stay.

Reviews.Title: “Disgusting! I should get compensated!”
Reviews.Author: Snobuny08
Reviews.Content: I recently stayed here for one night. The front desk staff was friendly. However, as far as house cleaning, if I were the manger I would hire new staffing. Our house keeper did not clean out the rusty fridge. There were several take out containers from the previous tenant. All our towels were stained (a little bleach goes a long way...or buy new towels), and our bathtub had hair in it which definitely showed it hadn't been cleaned. I was so disgusted by the fridge. Since when is rust on all the shelves inside the fridge and old food from whoever stayed there a sanity thing? I brought food to put in the fridge and was so surprised to see the condition of it. A mini fridge is not that expensive to replace nor would new shelving be. I wish I had brought my own towels to this place because every towel I picked up had brown large stains or weird green stains. They looked very dirty. On top of that, Tammy the house keeper left a tip envelope with her name on it. A little suggestion to "Tammy," if you want tips, do your job properly. I relied on reviews and saw a printed trip adviser top rating flyer framed at the front desk. I feel misled! I honestly want compensated after staying here!! I paid for a nice vacation but instead it made me wish I packed cleaning supplies and towels from my own home to do someone elses job. People can get sick this way!!!

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful stay!”
Reviews.Author: gman121176
Reviews.Content: We were not planning on staying here. Our other motel lost our reservation and we called and they had a room. The room was great. Close to the beach, very clean rooms. The pool was clean. My family will definitley be coming back next year. Nothing fancy just right.

Reviews.Title: “Staying here now”
Reviews.Author: Jen1956
Reviews.Content: I have never stayed pool side before, it is a little different. The motel is OK enough, clean, little damp, small. My only troubles so far is they only gave us one key, and I have asked a dozen times for the second key and keep getting the same answer, we have to wait for the seemingly non-existent manager??????? We are on our second day, and still same answer. Good coffee, good location, hate to have my stay ruined by something so small, and I don't understand why they don't get that???

Reviews.Title: “Budget friendly but worth more than you pay”
Reviews.Author: princessmar18
Reviews.Content: We come to OC every year and stay at different places. We would stay here again. We are a couple so the room size was sufficient for us. The bathroom is small though for two people to get ready. Room offers a dorm size fridge and microwave. Pool was a great size and we never had an issue getting a chair. They even have 4 tables if you want to play cards. Very short walk to the beach. Few blocks from the boardwalk. Staff was very nice. Give it a try for the price it is worth it.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome Beach Getaway”
Reviews.Author: Zack T
Reviews.Content: My family absolutly loves staying here. It's a very short walk to the beach. The staff at the Thunderbird are always polite and willing to help us with our every need. Hotel appears to be very clean and well kept. I would highly recomend this hotel to anyone wishing to have the ultimate beach experience.

Reviews.Title: “The budget friendly vacation”
Reviews.Author: golfpro76
Reviews.Content: Me and some buddies love to take a week long getaway to Ocean City in the summers when we can. We've stayed at the Thunderbird almost every time. We don't need much, just a place to take a nap once a day, and somethin that won't do much damage to the bill fold. This year was the first time we've been able to get away in 4 years and we were blown away with how much had changed since the last time we were there. Everything from new beds to flat screen tv's, even new management. The kid that runs the place was really down to earth and he was somewhere on the property at all times. One mornin when I walked out of the room, he was 4 rooms down helpin house keeping. The entire staff treated us like they had known us for years and were always helpful in pointin us in the right direction for where to go and what to stay clear of. We were a 2 minute walk to the beach and across the street from a Tiki Bar. Sure, it's not a Hilton, but definitely worth $200. You can't find a better deal in OC.

Reviews.Title: “Infested with Bed Bugs”
Reviews.Author: Shravan M
Reviews.Content: We rented 3 rooms and paid $200+ per night for each room. All three rooms were infested with bed bugs. When we complained and asked for another room, the manager first of all refused to accept that that there were bed bugs but conveniently told us that he would give us a discount. He could not move us to another hotel because the hotel was full. We could go to another hotel because everything was super-expensive. In the end the manager gave us a $100 discount on our entire bill which was around $1200. The cleaning was very friendly and asked us why is there blood on the bed sheets (We killed some bed bugs who were sucking our blood). Then she told us "Now I realise why I see drops of bloods on the bed sheets all the time while cleaning." No ironing machines, Water supply was cut off at night, parking was a problem, good location (right at the beach), a mile or two from the boardwalk Do not even go here if this is your last choice

Reviews.Title: “Needs lots of Improvements”
Reviews.Author: Heather H
Reviews.Content: I would not stay here again. All I ask for is a bed to sleep in and hot water to take a shower. Well let's just say, yes I had the bed and thats about it. the shower curtain had blood stains on it, not even a pinch of hot water. The water was cold and it doesn't help when it trickles out of the shower head either. Was getting ready to go out and was blowing drying my hair and the power kept going out. Apparently 2 rooms next store to each other can't blow dry at the same time? And I woke up on the morning of checkout and I had a bug crawling on my pillow. That was it for me. The girls at the front desk were not nice nor considerate when I called the desk for assistance. 200 bucks a nite and I can't even sleep when I got home from the bar because our neighbors had to be out side smoking weed and drinking at 3am. I understand your on vacation but be considerate of others around. I guess you get what you pay for. I just think some improvements need to be done.

Reviews.Title: “Very Nice!”
Reviews.Author: smiley1070
Reviews.Content: We just returned from a trip to OC and loved this motel.Very nice value.It has a great pool and a nice location just within steps of the beach.Across the street are several restraunts and Jolly Rogers. No noise from the streetas you are at the end of the one way street. The room was nice and clean with 4 pillows to a bed.Has a microwave and a larger frig that will hold alot.There are families with children so there will be kid noise. Will stay here again!!

Reviews.Title: “great hotel”
Reviews.Author: monroegolf
Reviews.Content: the people were very professional and well mannered. the rooms are much better then last year with new king size beds much better now. i have been comming to this hotel for many years and every year i am suprised when i see just how much the update the rooms. the new Manager Austin was very helpful and quite professional. what a great change from many years ago.

Reviews.Title: “Hotel stay”
Reviews.Author: JohnandLaura459
Reviews.Content: It was okay the price wasn't bad for the stay but we thought it had private balconies pool was nice and the beach was right behind us no boardwalk

Reviews.Title: “You get what you pay for, but not here”
Reviews.Author: vick2121
Reviews.Content: Horrible stay. I want only one thing from a hotel room: a place to sleep. paper thin walls, people running around screaming until 3 in the morning, a bed with a divot in the middle so the 2 occupants both slide in the hole. Location and price did not make up for the fact we did not sleep. There are 100's of other options, pick any one of them for a better stay

Reviews.Title: “What a great motel!”
Reviews.Author: Jamie B
Reviews.Content: Last weekend my family were able to take a quick trip to Ocean City. Initially i found the Thunderbird motel's prices and accommodations to be great! I have to admit I was skeptical of what we were getting for such a great price. On arrival the front desk staff were very pleasant and extremely helpful. Or room was very clean, well kept, and modernly updated. Our children loved having the pool just outside the room and enjoyed the short walk to the beach. With amenities like a flat screen TV, free coffee in the lobby 24 hrs, nearby ice/soda machines, friendly staff, and great prices i would recommend this motel to anyone!

Reviews.Title: “Nothing special”
Reviews.Author: OnlineAddict
Reviews.Content: I don't understand the raving reviews on here. I booked it based on those reviews and what a mistake! The rooms are tiny! The beds are not comfortable, we woke up so stiff. The pool was dirty. You don't get any view whatsoever of the beach. There are no balconies or at least outside chairs to relax outside. When in the room, you feel like your in prison because it's so small and no sunshine. There are 2 tiny windows in the bathroom & back of the room which face a hotel. The windows in the front of the room give you no privacy, people from the street can look right into your room! The rates are the same as better hotels on the boardwalk with a view of the beach, balconies etc... This would be my last option in OC! Now on their website it states they made upgrades for 2012. The sheets were new, crisp and felt like sand paper, they still had the fold creases from the packaging, which makes me think they weren't even washed. They had a 32in flat screen in one room, and the old tube TVs in the other room. The carpet did look new...but the bathroom was very old and smelled like urine. So I guess new sheets, TV and carpet is the upgrades they were referring to. The shower was not fun, I kept getting shots of ice water every couple mins, then piping hot water.

Reviews.Title: “Mother's Day Weekend at the Thunderbird”
Reviews.Author: SueT523
Reviews.Content: We had the pleasure of staying at the Thunderbird Beach Motel in Ocean City over Mother's Day weekend 2012. Check-in was a breeze and the room was was clean and comfortable with a refrigerator, microwave, A/C and flat-screen TV. There were four of us and there was plenty of hot water even with back-to-back showers. The motel has a pool and on-site parking. Austin Purnell and his staff are friendly, helpful and professional. The location of the Thunderbird is wonderful: half block from the beach, easy walking distance to restaurants, stores, and amusement park. If you are looking for a good, family-friendly, reasonable priced motel this is the one you are looking for!

Reviews.Title: “Hidden Gem”
Reviews.Author: krh01
Reviews.Content: We have been going to OC for 30+ years and have stayed in many different places. The Thunderbird Beach Motel is a hidden gem we discovered this July. Super location, great price, genuinely nice and helpful staff, and very nice grounds. The focus for our Ocean City fun is easy access to the beach and to be able to park the car once and walk to all the great places that midtown OC has to offer. This hotel offered all we needed for a very reasonable price at the height of the season. Access to the nice pool and changing area on the last day after checkout is a great amenity. We will definitely be back!

Reviews.Title: “clean, but basic”
Reviews.Author: nannyca
Reviews.Content: this motel is very clean but old. it's close to the beach.

Reviews.Title: “no complaints here.”
Reviews.Author: a e
Reviews.Content: spent first week of august there, great location and price and staff . family friendly motel , I like the fact that the security didnt tolerate no nonsense from young people. would definelty return.

Reviews.Title: “Good place to stay on a budget.”
Reviews.Author: Jody G
Reviews.Content: I was pleasantly surprised when we arrived to find the hotel to be well taken care of for a 50+ year old building, and we were quite happy with the value of the Thunderbird. Comparable hotels were nearly twice the money. We didn't need an ocean view or a balcony, so this place fit the bill just fine. Parking was ample, water was hot (quite hot if you want it to be!). There is a heated pool outside, which was also nice and clean. There always was some kind of staff on the premises (outside the office), which is nice should the need arise for any kind of assistance. The staff was quite pleasant and helpful as well.

Reviews.Title: “nice value”
Reviews.Author: wendy c
Reviews.Content: took an overnight trip..... got a room..... clean and comfortable...... not bad for the money and the location was good! would go back.... bathroom with a shower for afterward check out! only downfall.........no coffee pot

Reviews.Title: “Won't be coming back!!”
Reviews.Author: summerfun59
Reviews.Content: The good news is the location is great and the bed is very comfortable. I did not get upset when it took 5 minutes of jiggleing with the key to open the door. Or that there was no hot water when we showered at 6:00 pm. When we got back from dinner at 11:00 and there was no place to park I did get upset. My husband waited in the car while I went into the office to ask where the additional parking was. The guys working told me that there are more rooms than parking spaces. When I questioned what we should do, he responded with a nice smile, "Uh, I can't pick up a car and move it." After a wonderful dinner out, the evening ended with disappointment as blisters on my feet developed from the walk from the street a few blocks away.

Reviews.Title: “Reserved on the fly, glad we took the chance!”
Reviews.Author: sevenangels
Reviews.Content: Bah to those negative reports! I worked for several years in the tourist motel industry. I know both the positive and negative and I can tell you these are good people. Austin on the front line was helpful and kind. Ray doing maintenance couldn't have been nicer. the chamber staff were so very pleasant. Ice maker worked fine, room was clean, location great, parking ample, noise level fine (we were on 2nd floor), pool clean etc etc. If you want some stuffy resort go elsewhere but if you want real people, a decent place to stay and ok cost, this is the place for you.

Reviews.Title: “Great location”
Reviews.Author: beachbum60763
Reviews.Content: No frills...just a place to sleep! Great loc for the beach & short walk to boardwalk! Good value for the money. Nice Staff & good housekeeping. Great for short weekend trip.

Reviews.Title: “It's ok. Close to the beach without having to pay an outrageous price.”
Reviews.Author: desimami
Reviews.Content: We used the hotel just for sleeping. We stayed on the first floor. The first night it was quiet but the second night there were people outside talking which could be heard in the room, but nothing crazy. The best thing about the room was the ac. It is a small motel with a small pool, but clean. The room had a microwave and a small frig, which came in handy. The night we got to our room there were no towels and only soap bars. We had to call and ask for some towels. Also bring your own toiletries such as shampoo and a hairdryer. I spayed the entire room and looked for any unwanted tiny visitors, but everything was okay (thank God). I also looked at night, i am a little paranoid on finding bed bugs or anything else, but i have to say Nothing! The motel is a 30 second walk to the beach. It is a supper easy walk for children especially holding chairs, umbrella, sand toys, etc. It is definitely not the nicest hotel but i do have to say for the price compared to the other hotels in the strip it is the best price. If you are just using the hotel for sleeping, stay there. The lobby staff needs to be a little friendlier and approachable. When we asked for any restaurant recommendations they really could not come up with anything.

Reviews.Title: “you pay for what you get”
Reviews.Author: elara829
Reviews.Content: we thought it was pretty sketchy but its not a bad place to stay, but expect other people that are looking for cheap housing as well (students, etc). staff was nice, room was clean, big fridge, microwave. outdated tv. icemachine didnt have ice in it. but overall everything was clean. great place if you need a place to crash.

Reviews.Title: “Nice average motel...”
Reviews.Author: Lyoder11
Reviews.Content: We enjoyed our stay at the Thunderbird motel. It is an average motel but was clean and each room has a microwave and refrigerator. Our refrigerator kept everything very cold - in fact one day one of the green teas was slightly frozen. Brenda, our housekeeper was very nice and friendly! On the last day of our stay, the hotel let us keep our car parked in the hotel and then use their changing room (with shower) after we came off the beach that day. We really appreciated that gesture. The only real negative is the ice machine. I went at various hours of the day from early morning to late at night and the machine never had ice. The ice machine really needs to be updated to accommodate the guests. I hope that the management will look into this issue as I am not the only one to complain. Either a bigger ice machine is necessary or add a second one. Overall we enjoyed our stay and the price is right for this motel.

Reviews.Title: “not bad”
Reviews.Author: vacationdude51
Reviews.Content: ok so its not the newest place in ocean city, but for the cost not bad. we just sleep and shower then we are off all day and evening. considering ocean city is one expensive place to vacation, like food cost, boardwalk entertainment, etc... the hilton next door is way over priced. stayed at comfort inn on 5th st. room was ok. pool was dirty, and clothes laying around. nasty compared to the little pool at thunderbird. i guess its what you want to spend. if you want to keep up with the joneses go the the hilton, they are laughing all the way to the bank, just like me.

Reviews.Title: “good bargain..don't listen to all the bad reviews.”
Reviews.Author: SixxMe
Reviews.Content: We go to Ocean City every year and always stay somewhere between 1st street and 33rd street. We normally stay at a nice hotel like the Hilton or a 2 bedroom condo but this year my husband lost his job so we didn't have much money. I will admit that after reading all the reviews I was skeptical. I am very picky when it comes to places and cleanliness and we travel alot. This hotel is not bad. For the money and location it was great! It is no Hilton but we only really use the hotel to sleep in. They had a pool which we loved to go in after being on the beach. It was great! Also they had a little tiki bar right across the street which was nice and they had the best $2 rum runners!! Overall we had a great experience and would go back again.

Reviews.Title: “Much better than last time!”
Reviews.Author: beachgrrl22
Reviews.Content: This hotel has made some nice improvements from the last time I stayed. It is now under new ownership and I had a much more pleasant stay this year. The service was excellent. The rooms are like every other basic room you find in Ocean City. Ours was clean and that's what matters. We didn't have any problems with noise from other rooms. The prices are reasonable and the location is very good.

Reviews.Title: “clean place to sleep for cheap.”
Reviews.Author: blondefourlife
Reviews.Content: The hotel was clean, The room was small but there was four of us. Every thing was good with the hotel staff, I only encountered one maid that seemed a bit grumpy but she didn't say anything to me or smile and I figured she had a bad day. Any way My family and I would recommend this hotel to any one that doesnt have a lot of money and still wants to sleep in a comfortable bed and have a clean room.

Reviews.Title: “Decent Price for Thrifty Accommodations”
Reviews.Author: JAlexanderNYC
Reviews.Content: The room was clean and the decor was dated. However, the motel was less than a block from the beach and was a few blocks from the Jolly Roger Amusement Park. It was a great location for families and was in walking distance to what you need. Good bargain for the location.

Reviews.Title: “best bang for your buck”
Reviews.Author: Pistol56
Reviews.Content: Cant beat the thunderbird, its good location, its a 50yard walk to the beach, 2nd year staying there and had no problems what so ever. The rooms were alot better this year, they were alittle more clean then last. That was the only problem but they got that down so there isnt to much to complain about at the thunderbird. The Price cant be beat, its not the hilton so dont expect that but it you want to waste all your vacation money on a fancy room your just gonna change in and sleep then walk across the street. The thunderbird is great place to stay and the best bang for your buck. cant beat it!!!

Reviews.Title: “Good Value For The Money”
Reviews.Author: someparamedic
Reviews.Content: The Thunderbird was a good place to stay, the room was decent and had a microwave, safe, and small refrigerator. Staff was courteous and immediately attentive to any needs. Excellent value for the money especially for a family on a budget. I would recommend to others and would stay at again.

Reviews.Title: “Girls Weekend”
Reviews.Author: Cathy907
Reviews.Content: 2nd year at the Thunderbird and will return again. Staff was great, room was fine & location is perfect.

Reviews.Title: “Best value in OCMD, PERIOD.”
Reviews.Author: Laxman37
Reviews.Content: Stayed in the Thunderbird in early June 2010 with a group of friends, I have to say that I am very surprised to see some of the earlier reviews. From a value standpoint this place cannot be beat, the staff was friendly and accommodating, and the location is ideal for any OC visitor. Either the new management has seriously turned this place around or the earlier negative posts were from people who look for the cheap rates and expect the Ritz-Carlton. From my experience, you're not gonna get a better bang for your buck! I will be back.

Reviews.Title: “You get what you pay for.. Cheap and Dirty”
Reviews.Author: Karjan83
Reviews.Content: I recently just returned from OCMD and we stayed at the Thunderbird for 5 nights.. the location of the hotel is great but that is about it! the room was very dated and old it was not clean there was hair on the floor and in the tub of the bathroom.. the beds were uncomfortable..we the maid never came to clean our room each day we had to track someone down just to get clean towels and when we did the maid was very rude about giving us some clean towels..the pool was alright but needs to be monitered by staff several times when i attempted to go in the pool with my friends there were kids in the pool with food and drinks which was discusting. the website states there is 1 parking spot per room but this is not true we did not have a spot in the lot for 3 days we had to park on the street that made me very nervous leaving my car where i could not see it.. this was my first stay at the thunderbird and will def be my last! i have family heading down to OCMD next month and they were going to book at the thunderbird but now have changed their mind and our staying else where! Beware the price may look good but i definatly encourage anyone to spend a little more to stay somewhere else..

Reviews.Title: “Nice little motel”
Reviews.Author: sprayguy
Reviews.Content: We Just got back from OCM, stayed here. It was worth the money. This is no 5 star hotel. don't get me wrong, but, it was nice. The rooms have some wear. They were very clean. If you all you need is a place to lay your head for the night, you can't beat this deal. 1 minute walk to the beach.

Reviews.Title: “Would not stay here next year!”
Reviews.Author: Argrycust
Reviews.Content: I was just recently at this hotel the first weekend in June with my boyfriend and our 2 best friends. Throughcheck in the staff was friendly and there was no problems, but however when it came time for bed neither my boyfriend or I slept comfortably due to the beds. The beds were absolutly horrible you could feel every spring. It literally would have been more comfortable to sleep on a piece of plywood. Then after coming back from the beach the next afternoon I went to take a shower and there was like no water pressure, not to mention the water went from scolding hot to ice cold. After showering the electric went out 4-5 time on me and 1 time on my friend. When we caller down stairs they told us that the room next door was using a blow dryer as well. We even turned all the lights out in our room so I could try to dry my hair and the power still went out. The only thing we got was a coupon for breakfast upon checkout. Neither myself or my boyfriend will ever stay at this place again! That was absolutly unacceptable for the electric to turn off that many times, I didn't even get to finish drying my hair!

Reviews.Title: “Won't be staying again.”
Reviews.Author: beachgrrl22
Reviews.Content: The hotel is in a good location. Close to the boardwalk. Close to the beach. Parking was an issue most nights when we returned from our activities. Our room was on the 3rd floor, no elevator, so it wasn't much fun hauling a week's worth of luggage up all those stairs. The room was very dated and wasn't exactly the cleanest but we made due for the week that we were there since we weren't in the room very often. The pool was disgusting. Someone had decided to go to the bathroom in the pool and it was just floating around. After that discovery we didn't visit the pool again. For the price we paid we could've gotten something a lot better.

Reviews.Title: “This place is a scam!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: mcgillrdh
Reviews.Content: This is by far the worst hotel i've ever stayed at. The hotel security are stalkers and will find any reason to evict you. On our way back from being out that night we were greeted at our door by security informing us to pack our stuff because we were being evicted. The creepo security guard wouldnt even let us shut the door to get changed. He stood in the doorway and watched every move we made. They accused us of trespassing and had the police come to escort us out. The police felt so bad for us that they helped us carry our bags out!!!!! They admitted this happens all the time. So here we are 4 girls in their 20's with no where to sleepat 3AM!!!!. These people should be assamed of themselves. I hope this doesnt happen to anyone else. It was a waste of money and ruined our vacation.

Reviews.Title: “Worst hotel experience I have ever had.......”
Reviews.Author: amem07
Reviews.Content: and trust me- I travel for work a lot! I read another review about this hotel that basically had the same experirence, but to sum it up we also were evicted by the sercurity guard. They said we had 5 people staying in our room (there were 4 of us) and a friend of mine that came down just for the day to visit. They told us unless you are staying at the hotel you are not allowed on the property (they accused us of trespassing) also, they informed us that you are not allowed to have guests in your hotel rooms that are not staying there. We were evicted after we had been out, so they were waiting at our room for when we came back to the room. So they put 4 girls out on the street at 3 in the morning. The stafff was incredible rude and stood there while we had to try to pack everything and leave. The guard even kicked the door open at one point while we were trying to get changed and told us to change in the bathroom. I wish there was something else I could do to get the word out about this hotel and make sure no one every stays there again. Trust me if you are looking for a budget hotel there are plenty of other ones in OCMD to choose from....... STAY SOMEWHERE ELSE!

Reviews.Title: “Good price, clean & basic”
Reviews.Author: kiss-my-kitty
Reviews.Content: My husband, our two small children, my mother and myself recently spent four days at Ocean City, MD, and we stayed in the Thunderbird Beach Motel. Honestly, I have no complaints (except that the pillows were a bit lumpy, and the bed springs were a bit out of shape)! The prices were reasonable, and the accommodations, while basic, were clean and more than up to our standards. Our room featured two double beds, a desk, a table with two chairs, a night stand, a small fridge with freezer compartment, a microwave, a safe and a bathroom, as well as plenty of lighting and a temperature-adjustable air conditioning unit. Everything was clean and in full working order, the staff were friendly and were always on top of things in terms of housekeeping and keeping indoor and outdoor areas clean. The motel also has a temperature regulated pool, which was accessible through one gate, whose latch was high up -- perfect for keeping children out of the pool area, or in it. The pool was clean and pristine, as were the poolside chaises and tables. Once we checked out, we were still able to access both the pool and restrooms that featured showers -- quite handy once we were finished with our last jaunt to the beach! Best of all was the close proximity to the beach -- literally a 1-2 minute walk! Overall, we thoroughly enjoyed our stay, especially since we weren't looking for a large, luxurious suite -- just somewhere to sleep, eat and change! We would definitely make reservations again with the Thunderbird Beach Motel.

HotelInfo.Name: Thunderbird Beach Motel
HotelInfo.Address: 3110 Baltimore Ave., Ocean City, MD 21842
